intent_atoms.description: Wire edit list payloads into validation so reconciled presentation durations align with movie/track headers and flag gaps or overlaps.
Extend duration diagnostics to reference edit list context.
Reconciled presentation durations must align with movie/track headers.

Refresh fixtures, JSON exports, and snapshot baselines covering common edit list scenarios (empty list, single offset, multi-segment, rate adjustments) so VR-014 diagnostics have full regression coverage.
Fixtures, JSON exports, and snapshot baselines must cover empty list, single offset, multi-segment, and rate adjustment scenarios.
VR-014 diagnostics must have full regression coverage.
Implement baseline metadata box coverage for udta, meta (handler), keys, and ilst atoms, surfacing simple string/integer payloads for CLI export.
Handler mappings must remain consistent with archival context.
Baseline metadata box coverage includes udta, meta (handler), keys..

functional_units.name: Edit List Duration Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that presentation durations from edit lists align with movie/track headers and flags gaps or overlaps.

functional_units.name: Edit List Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Refreshes fixtures, JSON exports, and snapshot baselines for common edit list scenarios to provide regression coverage.

functional_units.name: Metadata Box Coverage Export
functional_units.description: Parses udta, meta (handler), keys, and ilst atoms and surfaces simple string/integer payloads for CLI export.

functional_units.name: Sample Size & Chunk Offset Correlation Validation
functional_units.description: Correlates stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 offsets to flag mismatches with sync sample metadata.
